text:
Hi folks, I'm facing one issue.

Issue: Unable to Send Emails to Contacts in Developer Portal

I’ve been using the HubSpot API to send emails to contacts via the *single-send API*. The email functionality works perfectly when sending emails to *users*. However, when I attempt to send an email to a *contact*, I receive the following error: "Email not allowed to be sent to the specified recipient in a sandbox or developer test portal."

You can’t send emails to contacts from a sandbox account that aren’t users. You can only send to users of the account.

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/account-management/set-up-a-HubSpot-standard-sandbox-account|https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/account-management/set-up-a-HubSpot-standard-sandbox-account>
